categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic young-adult novels

nodes.text: The High Republic: Midnight Horizon is a forthcoming canon young adult novel written by Daniel José Older as part of the multimedia project Star Wars: The High Republic. It is scheduled to be published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on February 1, 2022.
Two hundred years before the events of Star Wars: The Phantom Menace, in the era of the glorious High Republic, the Jedi are the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy!
Another exciting young adult adventure featuring Jedi and their Padawans as they fight the nefarious villains the Nihil!
The New York Times best-selling series continues.... For light and life!
